item.title: [317] My Chest I added isn't working [317] DELTA
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Guys i am trying to add a chest where you need key to open it and i get no errors but when i click the chest nothing happens at at at all.

Here’s what i put in item.java

[code]public static int dono[] = {9814, 9811, 9812, 9813, 9801, 9800, 13645, 9802, 9804, 9805, 9807};

    public static int randomDono()        
    {            
            return dono[(int)(Math.random()*dono.length)];        
    }[/code]

In Client.java

if(objectID == 75){ if(playerHasItem(989, 1)) { deleteItem(989, 1); addItem(Item.randomDono(), 1); sM("You search the chest and find some items!"); } else sM("You Need A Crystal Key To Use This Chest!"); }

Why isn’t it working?

Thanks

Read full topic
